TopicTitle: AirBooster AB400 Fully Reusable Jet-Engine Powered First Stage

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow engineers!

My name is Dr. T and I am with FusionFlight LLC (www.fusionflight.com).

Today, I bring to you the AirBooster AB400. The AB400 is powered by 4x F100-PW-229 Afterburning Turbofan engines. I have created the animation below for your enjoyment!

Please don't hesitate to post any questions or comments on the AB400...

I always maintained that using turbojets for that first atmospheric ascent stage could be a very viable way to launch efficiently.

Now we just need the parts for 'em.

Edited October 21, 2014 by Gaalidas
